org.meganekkovr

クラス FrameInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.meganekkovr.FrameInput

  • public class FrameInput
extends java.lang.Object
    Native ovrFrameInput wrapper.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      int getButtonPressed()
      Pressed button from the last VrFrame.
      int getButtonReleased()
      Released button from the last VrFrame.
      int getButtonState()
      Bits are set for the buttons that are currently pressed down.
      float getDeltaSeconds()
      The amount of time in seconds that has passed since the last frame, usable for movement scaling.
      int getFrameNumber()
      Incremented once for every frame.
      double getPredictedDisplayTimeInSeconds()
      Predicted absolute time in seconds this frame will be displayed.
      float getSwipeFraction()
      Ranges from 0.0 - 1.0 during a swipe action.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getPredictedDisplayTimeInSeconds

        public double getPredictedDisplayTimeInSeconds()
        Predicted absolute time in seconds this frame will be displayed. To make accurate journal playback possible, applications should use this time instead of geting system time directly.
        戻り値:
        Predicted absolute time

      • getDeltaSeconds

        public float getDeltaSeconds()
        The amount of time in seconds that has passed since the last frame, usable for movement scaling. This will be clamped to no more than 0.1 seconds to prevent excessive movement after pauses for loading or initialization.
        戻り値:
        The amount of time in seconds that has passed since the last frame

      • getFrameNumber

        public int getFrameNumber()
        Incremented once for every frame.
        戻り値:
        Frame number

      • getSwipeFraction

        public float getSwipeFraction()
        Ranges from 0.0 - 1.0 during a swipe action. Applications can provide visual feedback that a swipe is being recognized.
        戻り値:
        Swipe fraction.

      • getButtonState

        public int getButtonState()
        Bits are set for the buttons that are currently pressed down.
        戻り値:
        Button state

      • getButtonPressed

        public int getButtonPressed()
        Pressed button from the last VrFrame.
        戻り値:
        Pressed buttons from the last VrFrame.

      • getButtonReleased

        public int getButtonReleased()
        Released button from the last VrFrame.
        戻り値:
        Released button from the last VrFrame.
